tasks.build: deno task build:clean && deno task build:emit && deno task build:copy
tasks.build:emit: deno emit --compiler-options='{"lib":["dom","dom.iterable","dom.asynciterable","deno.ns"]}' --output dist/ src/main.ts src/api.ts src/map.ts src/ui.ts src/pwa.ts service-worker.ts
tasks.build:copy: cp -r index.html manifest.json assets data dist/
